results.title: Metformin and cyanidin 3-O-galactoside from Aronia melanocarpa synergistically alleviate cognitive impairment in SAMP8 mice.
results.text_hl: This study aimed to investigate the synergistic neuroprotective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_cyanidin_3_galactoside @CHEMICAL_MESH:C546035 @@@Cy3Gal@@@ by behavioral and histopathological assays and metabolite analysis in @<m>DISEASE_Ectromelia_Infectious</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004482 @@@SAMP8@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.
